detail_desc: Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
Wide T-shirt in sturdy jersey with a ribbed neckline.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a smocked bodice and small, smocked stand-up collar with a frilled edge. Concealed zip at the back, long, wide puff sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Gathered seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a lined, softly draping skirt.
Metal earrings with round pendants in marbled plastic. Length 8 cm.
Top in slub-weave jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-3Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
V-neck satin cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace details.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, drawstring at the front and short sleeves. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads.
Top in crêpe jersey with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
Fitted vest top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft twill with a sheen. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Textured-knit cardigan in a soft wool blend with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs. No buttons.

Leather trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, small appliqué and elasticated lacing at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR soles).
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a drawstring hood, V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Blouse in an airy, printed weave with a round neck with a V-neck opening and ties at the front and long raglan sleeves with a flounce down the sides. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and smocking at the hem. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This timeless sweatshirt is made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Brazilian briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey-lined trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and seams at the knees.
Knee-length dress in patterned jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with gathered elastication, and a slit at the front.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a Henley top and pair of leggings in organic cotton waffle jersey. Top with a button placket and long, cuffed sleeves. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and cuffed hems.
Short, wide blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Trims down the side seams and around the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Double-breasted pea coat in sturdy twill with welt side pockets, an inner pocket, a tab with a button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Tube scarf in a soft, textured knit.
Double-layered scarf in patterned silk. Size 9.5x100 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with decorations and a twisted band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Push-up bra in mesh and satin with underwired, thickly-padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons running diagonally at the top of one shoulder.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with beaded appliqués at the top, a turtle neck and low dropped shoulders.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Front fastening.
Trousers in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and back pockets.
Polo-neck top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves. Slim Fit.
Jumper knitted in a textured cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the front, long sleeves, decorative side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Loose-knit jumper in a nylon blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Short, A-line skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details and detachable, elasticated braces. Adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Wide top in scuba fabric with rounded shoulders and wide, dolman sleeves with pleats.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a back pocket.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, one button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, gently draping silk. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with a flare to the hem.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm.
Bucket hat in fleece with a reflective print motif. Embroidered eyelets in each side and a cotton twill sweatband inside.
Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Suit trousers in a linen weave with a regular waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket in the waistband, and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
Calf-length jersey dress in a viscose blend containing some linen with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in soft suede with a narrow collar, zip down the front and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, zipped side pockets, one inner pocket and a straight, glued hem. Lined in a viscose and cotton blend.
Knee-length, fitted skirt in suede with a high waist, visible zip at the back, decorative seams at the front and slit at the hem. Lined.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and soft brushed inside. Wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.
Long dress in a viscose crêpe weave with embroidery at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Joggers in cotton twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
